group_1.textCenter: (Not long after, I took the whole set of "Kirin"@volumes that featured the vampire home with me...)
(Sure enough, the manga story differed from that@of the stage play.)
(Let's go over the contents once more to sort@them out.)

group_1.narration: The vampire arc starts with Phantom Thief Kirin@arriving in a certain town.
On the outskirts of that town stood a castle@inhabited by a vampire.
The vampires and the townsfolk@waged a long-running feud@that smouldered on for many, many years...@Or so the manga tells us.
Our heroine, Kirin, hears word of a certain treasure@from the townsfolk. While originally theirs,@it was taken by the vampire long ago.@That treasure seems to be the main subject of the story.
The phantom thief confronts the vampire,@wins an epic standoff,@and returns the treasure back to the town.
[textBlack:The vampire's powers weaken drastically@after she loses the treasure.]
[textBlack:The last chapter reveals that@the townsfolk take advantage@of the vampire's weakened state@to advance on the castle@and strike her down.]
[textBlack:The townsfolk end up vanquishing the vampire@without Kirin's assistance,@and peace comes back to the town once more.]
[textBlack:And they all lived happily ever after...@The end.]

group_1.textCenter: (And yet, why does it make me feel so...)

group_1.textRight: Wow, you're reading manga for girls, Sis?@That's not something you see everyday.

group_1.textLeft: I *am* a girl too, you know.

group_1.textRight: It's drawn so cutely, too. Is it interesting?
Let me read it for a sec...

group_1.textLeft: The person I got this manga from loves it to@death.
She lent it to me after strongly insisting I@read it.
I'm not going to take the blame if someone@other than me damages it...

group_1.textRight: I see. Makes sense, I guess.

group_1.textCenter: (No...! This isn’t really why I can’t lend it to@him...!)
(In actuality, I don't want my brother to read@this vampire arc...!)
(He would only feel empty upon finishing it...)
(Yes, emptiness was the only thing that filled my@heart after I was done with this arc.)
(Was it because I perform as the vampire in the@play...?)
...[wait:1.0][chara:101601:eyeClose_0][chara:101601:lipSynch_1]What do I make of this outcome...
It appears the Day of the Dead has taken a liking@to throwing me one riddle after another...
Quite the deceptive fellow, that vampire...
